docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: Women who undergo hysterectomy with the removal of both ovaries face double the usual risk of heart disease if they do not receive estrogen supplements, a study has concluded.
docs.snippet: LEAD: Women who undergo hysterectomy with the removal of both ovaries face double the usual risk of heart disease if they do not receive estrogen supplements, a study has concluded.
